lines.text: You know me. It's my duty to please that booty!
This is Egyptian Cotton, motherfucker... two-twenty thread. That's like half your shitty-ass paycheck, okay?
You wouldn't know Egyptian cotton if the Pharaoh himself sent it to you, you knockoff-wearing motherfucker!
You play golf?
[Walter Wade Jr. nods]
Golf is phat... Tiger Wooo, Tiger Wooo, I like him.
[Trey starts seizing on the gurney]
Homeboy's got rhythm, huh?
What?
[Shaft punches Wade in the face]
What? Was it something I said? I think my nose is broke!
I've been waiting for this. You are gone from this precinct!
For what?

[punches Wade again]
For that?
Who lost your rap sheet for you?
You...
Who got you that Jets tryout?
You...
Who got you that gig at the club?
You.
Who delivers ten times outta ten?
Alright, dawg... You.
Do you know who my father is?
No, do you?
You're not a cop anymore.
Do you think that makes me less dangerous, or more dangerous?
You're too hot, man. You gotta step off a bit.

[In jail]
What you in here for, man? Income tax evasion?
[Walter Wade Jr. walks into Peoples' house, trying to look cool]
You tryin' to blend in or something? You look like a fucking duck hunter.
My name is Peoples. You know why they call me that?

[In a patronizing tone]
'Cuz you's always takes care of you's peoples?
More or less.
[Inside Rasaan's apartment]
Man, this is some repugnant shit.
Yo, Luger, what's up with the "cornbread" talk, man?
And your problem is what?
Nazis with badges, that's my problem!

[laughs]
"Nazis?" You gotta lighten up, Shaft. I talk like this all the time... but I see your point. Maybe I should take an "ethnic sensitivity" workshop, huh? Fuck you!
Maybe I should "workshop" my foot up your ass!
I know cats who'd take out whole zipcodes for that kind of cheese.
I'm gonna fuck you up for making me run!
Stick to what I know? Stick to what I know? I'm a star. Yo soy el mayembe!
It's Giuliani time!
Puta, why you flinch?
I see you someplace I don't think you belong... I will kill you.
This is Detective Vasquez. She's...
She's unavailable at the moment.
Yo Shaft, I'm gonna put so many lawyers in your ass, you're gonna think they opened a branch office up there.

[passing Carmen on his way toward gang members]
Anybody lookin' to maintain their employment with the NYPD
[draws his gun]
might be in their best interest to leave now...
April Fool, motherfucker. Told you not to make me run!

[Showing him his black eye]
I got fucking mugged I have no money
I hear you but the wheels are already in motion
I guess you've got to earn it back
How?

[Fat Man hands him a bag filled with drugs]
Ounces are a thousand eight balls are two eighty its already bagged and I'll tell you like I tell all my boys you cut it anymore than it already is you can say goodbye to repeat customers
You've got to be shitting me
You keep coming back we should be even Steven in six eight months

[to Shaft]
Why don't you pick a color? Black or blue?

[to Luger]
Hey, fuck you

[to Luger]
How about I make you both?

[after robbing Walter in disguise]
How'd I sound?
How did you sound?
"Freeze mofo I'll bust a cap in your dome"
You are a pure notorious P.I.G, how much we got?

[looking through the bag]
forty two thousand , it's a lot of cash for a simple murder around here
You got a boat?
I had one
What kind of boat you had?
Boston Whaler
You've been around the world right?

[Nods]
yeah
You know something, I've got so much money, and I've never been on an airplane my whole God damn life

[Pointing to Peoples' tattoo on his neck]
let me ask you something? What's that mean?
Five boroughs, five families, one love

[Chuckles]
Ok
You're an interesting motherfucker, do you have a business card or something?

You know in this neighborhood, I am the motherfucking king snake, but the thing of it is, I go downtown to take a girl out and show her the sights, I walk into a restaurant and my stomach is in a knot, my teeth is clenched, my hands are in a fist, I don't fit in down there, people look at me and size me up, so ten minutes into it I can't wait to come back home
Ok

the jewelry and shit, you go hock the flash and pay me the cash, I'm going to take it, but what I really want is for you to start taking me downtown with you, I want you to start taking me wherever you go
You mean like hangout together? Take you to the Harvard club? What the hell are you talking about?
I need someone located
"Located"? You mean found? Found then what?
[Walter looks at the gun around Tattoo's belt]
that's going to cost you

[Takes out a money belt filled with jewelry]
I had it all appraised it'll cash out to about forty thousand
When I say "me", "me ", is this
[Opens the door to a room showing him half naked women packaging drugs]
Oh
I was you to front for me, get me some upscale customers
If it's really important to you, you can tell everybody you've got a rich white boy on a rope I really don't care, I think you're too much of your own product, but drugs?, no fucking way
so why don't I sell contract to you? The guy says this shit will cash out to twenty grand I take half and you'll take half, it'll be the easiest money you can ever make

[to Walter Wade]
How you doing, Richie Rich? Remember me?

[hits Hernandez in the head with a basketball]
Peoples Hernandez! Come on down!
